name: Mah Jong Solitaire 2
description:
The puzzle game a popular download site called "the best of its kind for Mac". Nine different game modes, 81 layouts, a whooping 18 different tilesets, this deluxe edition of MJS2 is the best yet. Includes the MJS2 Booster Pack built in. Play in either 2D or 3D.

Simply match two "free" tiles, then match two more. Clear the board to win. Easy to pick up but difficult to master, you better plan ahead, winning at this game requires strategy. Once you've won the game compare your times against the rest of the world. That's one of the nine game modes. Then get ready for a real challenge with Memory Mahjong. Also includes easy modes for kids such as Tile Pickup and Simple Match.

In development for over 7 years, see why MJS2 has become such a firm favorite on Mac.
